entry.title: ButterCream Collection - The Art of Kissing
entry.summary:
Vendor: Light Elegance
Type: Gel
Price: 79.95

Save Time, Save Product & Increase Your Profits!

LE ButterCreams combine gorgeous one-coat coverage, thin application and the ability to create detailed line artwork all in one jar.

Kissing is truly an art, and we needed to look no further than the lips to find our inspiration for the all-new Winter 2021 The Art of Kissing ButterCream collection. Art, passion and creativity are the heart of LE ButterCreams, and The Art of Kissing captures all of these in a luscious palette of on-trend shades for Winter and all of your romantic festivities. The six complementary shades range from deep, dark and romantic to light, shimmery and flirtatious, and we hope your Winter kisses do, too.

(6) 5.5 ml ButterCream UV/LED color gels.

Includes
Frenching | Kiss of Death | Loose Lips | Peck on the Neck | Smooch | XOXO

Why Choose ButterCream?

  • 100% HEMA-monomer FREE!
  • Manufactured responsibly in Redmond, Oregon
  • 4+ week wear
  • One-coat coverage for faster services
  • Comprehensive color selection containing everything from classic nudes and neutrals to trendy, neon colors perfect to match your client
  • Thin application makes color removal fast and easy using a hand or eFile for effortless fills
  • Apply ButterCream to a fully structured nail
  • New seasonal colors available every year

Vendor: Light Elegance
Type: Gel
Price: 79.95

Save Time, Save Product & Increase Your Profits!

LE ButterCreams combine gorgeous one-coat coverage, thin application and the ability to create detailed line artwork all in one jar.

Influenced by the raw, natural beauty of the jungle and the abundant life sources that can be found throughout any wild environment, the new Fall 2020 The Mighty Jungle ButterCream collection welcomes all the fun and mystery the jungle represents. This distinction is easily seen in the new Fall color design, boasting shades from creamy green to milky bone white. This Fall, complete your look with six, creamy on-trend and fashionable shades that are applied with the easy one-coat application only LE ButterCream can deliver.

(6) 5.5 ml ButterCream UV/LED color gels.

Includes
Hear Me Roar | Jane of the Jungle | Letâ€™s Monkey Around | On the Prowl | Show Me Your Spots | Wanna Be My Tarzan?
